title: Problem method, defining the problem

Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Education of children
description: Episode of Series "Teacher Education". After becoming aware of pressure groups and their influence on legislation, the students in a social studies class, with the help of their teacher, define and analyse the problem and endeavour to find information upon which to base a satisfactory solution. Shows the procedures employed by the students in fathering and sharing information.
